long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,:
Write.as is a blogging platform focused on privacy. Write and publish instantly — no sign up required.

It is private and anonymous, so only those with a link to your post can see it, and we don't collect any data that you don't explicitly give us (like IP address, location, etc.).

If you have any feedback, feel free to tell us at hello@write.as or @writeas__ on Twitter.

***

What's New in v1.3

- Unpublish posts — remove a post from the web, but keep the URL
- Always show modified post contents in main post view
- Add RTL support
- Improve published/draft state indicators
- Improve post draft autosave
- Fix crash in posts list
- Fix inability to immediately retry publishing after failed request
- Fix back button navigation after publishing
- Better Settings organization
- Add Help link
- Fix OK button disabling after backspace in Backup dialog

See the full change history: https://write.as/changelog-chrome.html
long.de:
Write.as ist eine blogging Plattform die auf Privatsphäre fokussiert ist. Verfasse einen Text und veröffentliche diesen direkt — ohne Anmeldung oder Registrierung.

Es ist absolut anonym und privat, nur Personen die einen Link zu deinem Beitrag haben können diesen auch sehen. Es werden weder Daten gesammelt oder gespeichert (wie z.B. IP Adresse, Ort, etc.)

Wenn du irgendwelche Fragen oder Anregungen hast, dann kontaktiere uns unter dieser Mail Adresse hello@write.as oder auf Twitter @writeas__ 

Hier ist der Vollständige Changelog: https://write.as/changelog-chrome.html
long.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US:
Write.as is a blogging platform focused on privacy. Write and publish instantly — no sign up required.

It is private and anonymous, so only those with a link to your post can see it, and we don't collect any data that you don't explicitly give us (like IP address, location, etc.).

If you have any feedback, feel free to tell us at hello@write.as or @writeas__ on Twitter.

***

- Add Spanish translation

- Add Portuguese and Vietnamese translations

What's New in v1.3.4

- Add ability to easily copy post information from View Details dialog

What's New in v1.3.3

- Fix crash after deleting last post
- Fix toolbar actions after unpublishing post
- Start window unmaximized

What's New in v1.3.1/v1.3.2

- Ability to resize window

What's New in v1.3

- Unpublish posts — remove a post from the web, but keep the URL
- Always show modified post contents in main post view
- Add RTL support
- Improve published/draft state indicators
- Improve post draft autosave
- Fix crash in posts list
- Fix inability to immediately retry publishing after failed request
- Fix back button navigation after publishing
- Better Settings organization
- Add Help link
- Fix OK button disabling after backspace in Backup dialog

See the full change history: https://write.as/changelog-chrome.html
long.es,es_419:
Write.as es una plataforma de blogging enfocada en la privacidad. No se requiere registro, solo abrir la aplicación, escribir algo y publicarlo.

Es privado y anónimo, así que solo aquellos con un enlace a tu publicación podrán verlo. Y nosotros no recolectamos ningún dato que nos des explicitamente (como dirección, IP, ubicación, etc).

If you have any feedback, feel free to tell us at hello@write.as or @writeas__ on Twitter.

***

What's New in v1.3.6

- Add Spanish translation

What's New in v1.3.5

- Add Portuguese and Vietnamese translations

What's New in v1.3.4

- Add ability to easily copy post information from View Details dialog

What's New in v1.3.3

- Fix crash after deleting last post
- Fix toolbar actions after unpublishing post
- Start window unmaximized

What's New in v1.3.1/v1.3.2

- Ability to resize window

What's New in v1.3

- Unpublish posts — remove a post from the web, but keep the URL
- Always show modified post contents in main post view
- Add RTL support
- Improve published/draft state indicators
- Improve post draft autosave
- Fix crash in posts list
- Fix inability to immediately retry publishing after failed request
- Fix back button navigation after publishing
- Better Settings organization
- Add Help link
- Fix OK button disabling after backspace in Backup dialog

See the full change history: https://write.as/changelog-chrome.html
long.pt_BR:
Write.as é uma plataforma de blogs que está focada na privacidade. Não é preciso inscrever-se - basta abrir o app, escrever algo, e publicá-lo.

Isso é efetuado de forma privada e anônima, para que somente aqueles que tenham um link para o seu post o possam visualizar, e nós não recolhemos quaisquer dados que você não nos forneça explicitamente (como o endereço IP, localização, etc.).

***

What's New in v1.3

- Unpublish posts — remove a post from the web, but keep the URL
- Always show modified post contents in main post view
- Add RTL support
- Improve published/draft state indicators
- Improve post draft autosave
- Fix crash in posts list
- Fix inability to immediately retry publishing after failed request
- Fix back button navigation after publishing
- Better Settings organization
- Add Help link
- Fix OK button disabling after backspace in Backup dialog

See the full change history: https://write.as/changelog-chrome.html
long.vi:
Write.as là một nền tảng viết blog dựa trên sự riêng tư. Không cần phải đăng ký – chỉ cần mở ứng dụng ra, viết vài điều vào đó, rồi xuất bản.

Nó rất riêng tư và vô danh, nên chỉ những người có đường dẫn tới bài viết của bạn mới thấy được những nội dung này, và chúng tôi không thu thập dữ liệu mà bạn không công khai gửi đến chúng tôi (như địa chỉ IP, địa điểm v.v).

***

What's New in v1.3

- Unpublish posts — remove a post from the web, but keep the URL
- Always show modified post contents in main post view
- Add RTL support
- Improve published/draft state indicators
- Improve post draft autosave
- Fix crash in posts list
- Fix inability to immediately retry publishing after failed request
- Fix back button navigation after publishing
- Better Settings organization
- Add Help link
- Fix OK button disabling after backspace in Backup dialog

See the full change history: https://write.as/changelog-chrome.html
